mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PLACE_GUBUN AS placeGubun, BRANCH_GUBUN AS branchGubun, SPECIAL_STYLE_GUBUN AS specialStyleGubun, OPER_TIME_GUBUN AS operTimeGubun, OPER_START_TIME AS operStartTime, OPER_END_TIME AS operEndTime, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE AS checkOperEnable, SEVICE_FEE AS seviceFee, SECURITY_CORP_CODE AS securityCorpCode, FAC_HIRE_ENABLE AS facHireEnable, ADDR AS addr, UNUSL AS unusl, OPER_DAY AS operDay FROM ATMS_CORNER_STATUS

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, PLACE_GUBUN AS placeGubun, BRANCH_GUBUN AS branchGubun, SPECIAL_STYLE_GUBUN AS specialStyleGubun, OPER_TIME_GUBUN AS operTimeGubun, OPER_START_TIME AS operStartTime, OPER_END_TIME AS operEndTime, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE AS checkOperEnable, SEVICE_FEE AS seviceFee, SECURITY_CORP_CODE AS securityCorpCode, FAC_HIRE_ENABLE AS facHireEnable, ADDR AS addr, UNUSL AS unusl, OPER_DAY AS operDay FROM ATMS_CORNER_STATUS WHERE JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_CORNER_STATUS WHERE JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

UPDATE ATMS_CORNER_STATUS SET BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, PLACE_GUBUN = #{placeGubun}, BRANCH_GUBUN = #{branchGubun}, SPECIAL_STYLE_GUBUN = #{specialStyleGubun}, OPER_TIME_GUBUN = #{operTimeGubun}, OPER_START_TIME = #{operStartTime}, OPER_END_TIME = #{operEndTime}, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE = #{checkOperEnable}, SEVICE_FEE = #{seviceFee}, SECURITY_CORP_CODE = #{securityCorpCode}, FAC_HIRE_ENABLE = #{facHireEnable}, ADDR = #{addr}, UNUSL = #{unusl}, OPER_DAY = #{operDay} WHERE JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

INSERT INTO ATMS_CORNER_STATUS ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, PLACE_GUBUN, BRANCH_GUBUN, SPECIAL_STYLE_GUBUN, OPER_TIME_GUBUN, OPER_START_TIME, OPER_END_TIME, CHECK_OPER_ENABLE, SEVICE_FEE, SECURITY_CORP_CODE, FAC_HIRE_ENABLE, ADDR, UNUSL, OPER_DAY ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{placeGubun}, #{branchGubun}, #{specialStyleGubun}, #{operTimeGubun}, #{operStartTime}, #{operEndTime}, #{checkOperEnable}, #{seviceFee}, #{securityCorpCode}, #{facHireEnable}, #{addr}, #{unusl}, #{operDay} )
